name: AI Virus Evolved
description:
Test out your new holographic anti-virus system and delete your viruses before they make it to your computers vital parts! Utilize the 5 different turrets at your disposal to destroy the Boss virus and its minions.

This game was made as a student project, and the first of our team buildings exercises.

Programmer - Keaghan Potts
Designer - Victor Weidar

Thanks to Kevin McLeod for the music
